    Welcome to my homepage!

    I am an Assistant Professor at University of Brasilia.

    I was previously a Postdoctoral Researcher at Universitat Pompeu Fabra and Barcelona GSE. I received a PhD in Economics from Universidad Carlos III de Madrid in 2019.

    Research Interests:

    • Macroeconomics
    • Labor Economics
    • International Trade
